author: cnbc.com
title: OneLogin Expands World Class Enterprise Sales Organization as It Accelerates Upmarket
text:
Maura Theriault Joins as Enterprise Sales Vice President to Lead the Growth of OneLogin’s Enterprise Client Roster
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- OneLogin , the industry leader in Unified Access Management, today announced a continued rise upmarket with a new addition to its executive sales team. Leading the company’s efforts to build and serve its expanding enterprise client base, Maura Theriault joins OneLogin as Vice President of Enterprise Sales. In this role, she will lead a world-class team focused on delivering Unified Access Management during a period of tremendous growth for OneLogin.
Airbus, Mitsubishi Electric, and NASA are a few of the big name brands among OneLogin’s growing enterprise customer ranks. More than 2,000 enterprises globally secure access to their applications with OneLogin.
Theriault and her team will serve the growing market demand for Unified Access Management, enabling clients to manage their cloud migration strategy while maintaining the highest level of security. Client service will remain a top priority, delivering the high-touch, high-value experience OneLogin customers expect.
Theriault brings extensive experience working with Fortune 1000 companies to develop solutions that meet critical and strategic business needs related to IT infrastructure and support. As an enterprise software sales leader, she’s proven in launching and building SaaS businesses in highly competitive markets.
“Unified Access Management is a game changer. OneLogin has the winning foundation of differentiated technology, outstanding customer service, and forward-thinking clients,” said Theriault. “I’m thrilled to be joining a team that will help large companies in every sector on their digital transformation journey.”
“The future of Unified Access Management is here,” said OneLogin CEO Brad Brooks. “Our growth in the enterprise market is on an incredible trajectory. I’m delighted to have Maura leading our efforts to help large enterprises manage their cloud deployment.”
OneLogin’s mission is to provide simple and secure application access to enterprises as they accelerate their digital transformation. The company's Unified Access Management Platform (UAM) is built for hybrid customer environments, allowing companies of any size to manage access for on-premise and cloud applications with a single solution.
About OneLogin, Inc.
OneLogin is the leader in Unified Access Management, Enabling Organizations to Access the World™. OneLogin makes it simpler and safer for organizations to access the apps and data they need anytime, everywhere. The OneLogin Unified Access Management Platform secures millions of identities for thousands of companies around the globe, spans both cloud and on-prem environments, and unifies all users, devices, and applications to transform enterprises. We are headquartered in San Francisco, California. For more information, visit www.onelogin.com , Blog , Facebook , Twitter , or LinkedIn .
